com.code.aon.ui.form.listener
Class MasterControllerListener

java.lang.Object
  com.code.aon.ui.form.event.ControllerAdapter
      com.code.aon.ui.form.listener.MasterControllerListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
IControllerListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinesControllerListener
public class MasterControllerListener
extends ControllerAdapter

MasterControllerListener is a listener that must be registered in faces-bean-config.xml asociated with the master Controller. It handles the relation between master and child controllers.
